cell.html: Jo's future at Eastland is in jeopardy when she learns her scholarship funds are drying up and that Blair may be her only chance to stay.
cell.text: Jo's future at Eastland is in jeopardy when she learns her scholarship funds are drying up and that Blair may be her only chance to stay.

cell.html: Natalie is under pressure to reveal her source for a controversial article on a schoolmate's secret abortion she has written for the school paper.
cell.text: Natalie is under pressure to reveal her source for a controversial article on a schoolmate's secret abortion she has written for the school paper.

cell.html: Tootie's sudden personality change and slipping grades are the result of a hearing problem.
cell.text: Tootie's sudden personality change and slipping grades are the result of a hearing problem.

cell.html: Eastland's oldest living graduate, a rich eccentric, decides to leave her money to Eastland until Jo inadvertently changes her mind.
cell.text: Eastland's oldest living graduate, a rich eccentric, decides to leave her money to Eastland until Jo inadvertently changes her mind.

cell.html: Blair thinks she's doing a good deed by tutoring a mentally retarded young man, but the naive student misinterprets her good intentions.
cell.text: Blair thinks she's doing a good deed by tutoring a mentally retarded young man, but the naive student misinterprets her good intentions.

cell.html: Natalie finally uncovers the name of her biological mother.
cell.text: Natalie finally uncovers the name of her biological mother.

cell.html: Jo's got a new job, a new boyfriend and a new problem when her exceptional ability gains her a quick promotion over her boyfriend.
cell.text: Jo's got a new job, a new boyfriend and a new problem when her exceptional ability gains her a quick promotion over her boyfriend.

cell.html: Blair's close relationship with her father is tested when a tax audit uncovers her father's questionable accounting.
cell.text: Blair's close relationship with her father is tested when a tax audit uncovers her father's questionable accounting.

cell.html: Natalie covers a boxing match at Bates Academy, the nearby boys' school, for the school paper.
cell.text: Natalie covers a boxing match at Bates Academy, the nearby boys' school, for the school paper.

cell.html: An outspoken Natalie is determined to boycott the Sadie Hawkins Day school dance, but her one-man battle could leave her the odd woman out.
cell.text: An outspoken Natalie is determined to boycott the Sadie Hawkins Day school dance, but her one-man battle could leave her the odd woman out.

cell.html: Mrs. Garrett receives a marriage proposal from her elderly boyfriend.
cell.text: Mrs. Garrett receives a marriage proposal from her elderly boyfriend.

cell.html: Excitement reigns when royalty enrolls at Eastland, until Tootie accidentally discovers that the new student, a young princess, is a runaway who's getting ready to skip out again.
cell.text: Excitement reigns when royalty enrolls at Eastland, until Tootie accidentally discovers that the new student, a young princess, is a runaway who's getting ready to skip out again.

cell.html: Jo is concerned by Blair's infatuation with a boy who treats her poorly.
cell.text: Jo is concerned by Blair's infatuation with a boy who treats her poorly.

cell.html: When Mrs. Garrett is diagnosed with high blood pressure, the girls will do anything to shield her from stress. But their good intentions lead to a lie, a cover-up and big trouble.
cell.text: When Mrs. Garrett is diagnosed with high blood pressure, the girls will do anything to shield her from stress. But their good intentions lead to a lie, a cover-up and big trouble.

cell.html: Jo learns that her favorite teacher is terminally ill.
cell.text: Jo learns that her favorite teacher is terminally ill.

cell.html: The girls learn a frightening lesson about drinking and driving when they join Tootie's college-age brother and his roommate for a big night on the town.
cell.text: The girls learn a frightening lesson about drinking and driving when they join Tootie's college-age brother and his roommate for a big night on the town.

cell.html: Blair's sister Meg, a nun, inspires Jo.
cell.text: Blair's sister Meg, a nun, inspires Jo.

cell.html: When Jo decides that she wants to become a nun along with Blair's sister, Blair sees herself as the only one who can talk them out of it.
cell.text: When Jo decides that she wants to become a nun along with Blair's sister, Blair sees herself as the only one who can talk them out of it.

cell.html: Mrs. Garrett's cooking instructor from Paris visits Eastland. Meanwhile, the girls try to deal with a squirrel who got into their bedroom.
cell.text: Mrs. Garrett's cooking instructor from Paris visits Eastland. Meanwhile, the girls try to deal with a squirrel who got into their bedroom.

cell.html: When Cupid's arrow strikes, Natalie devotes all her time to her new beau, prompting a slighted Tootie into a deceitful course of action to regain her attention.
cell.text: When Cupid's arrow strikes, Natalie devotes all her time to her new beau, prompting a slighted Tootie into a deceitful course of action to regain her attention.

cell.html: Jo refuses to accept college assistance from Blair's family foundation.
cell.text: Jo refuses to accept college assistance from Blair's family foundation.

cell.html: In spite of Mrs. Garrett's opposition, the girls settle in for an all-night study session. As the hours slip away, every imaginable distraction impedes their preparation for final exams.
cell.text: In spite of Mrs. Garrett's opposition, the girls settle in for an all-night study session. As the hours slip away, every imaginable distraction impedes their preparation for final exams.

cell.html: Blair and Jo finally achieve a common bond when their graduation from Eastland causes a flood of preparations and overreactions from their parents and friends.
cell.text: Blair and Jo finally achieve a common bond when their graduation from Eastland causes a flood of preparations and overreactions from their parents and friends.

cell.html: Mrs. Garrett, Natalie and Tootie are reassuring and calm during the hectic last-minute graduation preparations. Blair and Jo see how much more they learned at Eastland than just academics.
cell.text: Mrs. Garrett, Natalie and Tootie are reassuring and calm during the hectic last-minute graduation preparations. Blair and Jo see how much more they learned at Eastland than just academics.

context.text: List of The Facts of Life episodes - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

List of The Facts of Life episodes
Further information might be found on the talk page or at requests for expansion . (January 2007)
Please help improve this article or section by expanding it.
